price: (Nyankopͻn bεka akyerε Soro abͻfoͻ no a ͻreka onipa no soͻ no ne nea ͻredi adanseε no sε): “Monto boniayεfoͻ, atuatefoͻ no nyinaa ngu Amane hunu gya no mu, -
arabic: أَلۡقِيَا فِي جَهَنَّمَ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ عَنِيدٖ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: alqiyā fī jahannama kulla kaffārin ʿanīdin
